TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {133478=JSWSteel Jul Fut, 211977=3i Infotech is in the Computers - Software sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 222.34 crore. The company management includes Hoshang N Sinor - Chairman, Madhivanan Balakrishnan - Managing Director & CEO, Ashok Shah - Director, N S Venkatesh - Nominee Director, K M Jayarao - Nominee Director, Shantanu Prasad - Nominee Director, Shashank Desai - Independent Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 532628 and the NSE with an NSE Code of 3IINFOTECH. Its Registered office is at Tower # 5, 3rd to 6th Floors,,International Infotech Park, New Mumbai,Maharashtra - 400703., 132260=28 July 2015, 132771=UnitedBrewerie Jul Fut, 210670=Zensar Technologies Recommended on Mar 24th 2015}
